A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Welcome to the strangest of all Star Wars movies: a film that ends where it begins; a film that teases bold change but only delivers a cosmetic touch-up here and there; a film of ravishing but empty style; a film written by a fan too respecting in the end to go beyond the bedroom of his thoughts; a film of bluffs and winks and slight of hand that makes you yearn for the story that was hiding there\, somewhere.
